name: Mystical Aliens
description:
This game was made for the Kenney Jam 2021.

You are an multicolor alien that need to exit this weird world by collecting 4 keys.

HOW TO PLAY:

Q or E to rotate alien color

R to  go to the spawn 

Space to jump

WASD to move

Alien powers:
  • Yellow -> Jumps more higher
  • Black -> Sees hidden path
  • Green -> Goes through green blocks
  • Blue -> Run faster
  • Pink -> Breaks pink blocks
